Container.Name: storedown
Container.Overview:
An inventory system that is hopefully simple enough for everyone!
For setup, run a CouchDB instance and configure with the following: Set the user and password environment variables. Go to `http://$serverurl:$port/_utils/#_config/nonode@nohost/cors` and enable CORS for your domain. Go to `http://$serverurl:$port/_utils/#_config/nonode@nohost` and in the httpd section, set `WWW-Authenticate` to `administrator` Go to `http://$serverurl:$port/_utils/#_config/nonode@nohost` and set in the chttpd section `require_valid_user` to `true`
Then create a database at `http://$serverurl:$port/_utils/`
Finally log in to storedown with the username, password, url, port, and database.
